synopsis.text: Although the Levamme Empire and the Amatsukami Imperium have been locked in a bitter war for years, the prince of the Levamme Empire pledges to end the conflict within a year as he proposes to Juana del Moral, the beautiful daughter of a noble family. However, the Amatsukami Imperium, intent on thwarting the union, launches an attack on the del Moral residence, putting Juana's life in grave danger. In a desperate attempt to unite the prince with his bride, the San Maltilia Airforce recruits a skilled but mistreated pilot of mixed blood, a bestado named Charles. Tasked with the secret mission of delivering Juana to the prince, Charles embarks on a perilous journey across the ocean and deep into enemy territory, facing unforeseen dangers at every turn.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
